bibl.title: The Florida Ostraka. Documents from the Roman Army in Upper Egypt.
bibl.seg: Bagnall Roger S., The Florida Ostraka (O. Florida). Documents from the Roman Army in Upper Egypt. (Greek, Roman and Byzantine Monographs. 7.)
Durham, North Carolina, Duke University, 1976, 8Â°, viii-75 pp., 31 figg. sur 16 pll.
